class.name: VideoStreamTheora
class.description: [VideoStream] resource handling the [url=https://www.theora.org/]Ogg Theora[/url] video format with [code].ogv[/code] extension. The Theora codec is decoded on the CPU. [b]Note:[/b] While Ogg Theora videos can also have an [code].ogg[/code] extension, you will have to rename the extension to [code].ogv[/code] to use those videos within Godot.

method.name: get_file
method.description: Returns the Ogg Theora video file handled by this [VideoStreamTheora].

method.name: set_file
method.description: Sets the Ogg Theora video file that this [VideoStreamTheora] resource handles. The [code]file[/code] name should have the [code].ogv[/code] extension.
